ZUI(PC端)

RickyFlex2020-09-05

# ZUI

ZUI文档open in new window

# 快速入门

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>ZUI</title>

    <!-- ZUI框架CSS文件 -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="./assets/css/zui.min.css" />

    <!-- 依赖jquery -->
    <script src="./assets/js/jquery.js"></script>

    <!-- ZUI框架JS文件 -->
    <script src="./assets/js/zui.min.js"></script>
</head>
<body>
    <h1>开关元素</h1>
    <div class="switch">
        <input type="checkbox">
        <label>开关</label>
    </div>

    <h1>面包屑导航</h1>
    <ol class="breadcrumb">
        <li><a href="javascript:void(0)">控制台</a></li>
        <li><a href="javascript:void(0)">用户列表</a></li>
        <li class="active">添加</li>
    </ol>

    <h1>分页器</h1>
    <ul class="pager" data-ride="pager" data-page="2" data-rec-total="89"></ul>

    <h1>漂浮消息</h1>
    <button id="btn">漂浮消息 - JS插件</button>
    <script>
        // 点击按钮时显示漂浮消息
        $('#btn').on('click', function() {
            new $.zui.Messager('这是一个浮动消息', {
                icon: 'bell' // 定义消息图标
            }).show();
        });
    </script>

    <h1>标签页 - 选项卡</h1>
    <ul class="nav nav-tabs">
        <li class="active"><a data-tab href="#tabContent1">标签1</a></li>
        <li><a data-tab href="#tabContent2">标签2</a></li>
        <li><a data-tab href="#tabContent3">标签3</a></li>
    </ul>
    <div class="tab-content">
        <div class="tab-pane active" id="tabContent1">
            <p>我是标签1。</p>
        </div>
        <div class="tab-pane" id="tabContent2">
            <p>标签2的内容。</p>
        </div>
        <div class="tab-pane" id="tabContent3">
            <p>这是标签3的内容。</p>
        </div>
    </div>
</body>
</html>
上次更新 2023/3/16 09:48:12
